alert.note: Alert for South Central Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 2:54PM MST until January 17 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MONDAY TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 1 inch. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches below 5500 feet, 5 to 10 inches above 5500 feet. * WHERE...South Central Utah. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 5 AM Monday to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on most routes through the Grand Staircase Monday into Tuesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
